title: Tech Firms From Dell to HP Warn of Memory Chip Squeeze From AI

title: Not up to code: security flaws, bias in foreign AI tool
description: Companies should scrutinise the artificial intelligence technology they deploy, researchers have warned, after vulnerabilities were found in a Chinese tool.
content:

title: Judge’s note on immigration agents using AI raises accuracy and privacy concerns
